blackjack:
Starts a game of [Blackjack](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blackjack).
If multiple users are mentioned, they will be invited to play a game against you.
If no user is mentioned, you will play against a bot.
connect4:
Starts a game of Connect 4.
If a user is mentioned, they will be invited to play a game against you.
If no user is mentioned, you will play against a bot.
word_guess:
Starts a game of Word Guess.
You have 6 attempts to guess a 5-letter word.
Enter a word to submit it as a guess.
:green_square: indicates a letter is in the right position.
:orange_square: indicates a letter is in the word, but in a different position.
:black_large_square: indicates a letter is not in the word.
:x: indicates your guess is not in the word list.
Enter `end` to end the game
8ball: Uses a magic 8 ball to answer a question

loop: Toggles looping for the current player
move: Moves a song from one position in the queue to another
nowplaying: Displays the song that is currently playing
play: Plays a specified video from YouTube
queue: Shows videos in the queue at a specified page (defaults to page 1)
remove: Removes an item at a specified position
stop: Completely stops the player and disconnects it from the voice channel
volume: Sets the volume from 0-100, or displays the current volume if no volume argument is given

help: Displays help messages for a command, or an entire category of commands
ctx: Displays help messages for context menu commands
ping: Displays the bot's response time in milliseconds

ship: Calculates the compatibility between a specified user and another person/object

ocr: Gets all text from attached images
translate: Translates a specified message into a specified language
